source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard appears ill. Could it be he is recovering from another long evening at the Forgotten Knight, or is something else disturbing the viscount?
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_00<tab>聖ガンリオル占星院のジャンヌキナルは、心配事があるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_01<tab>According to Jannequinard, Lady Leveva has abandoned her preparations for the astrology symposium to lament the return of Kyokuho to his homeland of Hingashi. He has asked if you cannot help locate her in the Pillars and talk some sense into the young woman.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_01<tab>ジャンヌキナルから、手分けしてレヴェヴァを探してほしいと、依頼を受けた。研究に行き詰まっているレヴェヴァが、深刻な様子でギルドを出たきり、戻らないらしい。イシュガルド上層で、「レヴェヴァ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_02<tab>A simple search of the Pillars reunites you with Lady Leveva who, after a winded conversation, bids you safe travels to Kugane where she expects you to overcome some unforeseen disaster to obtain an undetermined amount of knowledge. And hope. Copious amounts of hope.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_02<tab>レヴェヴァを発見した。レヴェヴァは、キョクホウに降りかかる災いについて心配していた。キョクホウを助けるため、クガネで、星がよく見える場所について、人々から話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_03<tab>Several kind residents (and some less-than-kind ones) have given you a good idea as to where you might find a good view of the heavens─Tasogare Bridge overlooking the piers.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_03<tab>クガネの人々から話を聞き、星がよく見える場所を特定した。キョクホウを探すため、クガネの黄昏橋にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA38101 /var>」にて、周囲を見渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_04<tab>Kyokuho believes that with your astrological expertise, he may be able to mend the weakened bonds maintaining the geomantic barrier that protects the city from attack from supernatural wildlife. He has bid you meet him at the Short Pier's westerly shrine.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_04<tab>キョクホウと話した。クガネの結界を張り直すため、小波止場の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA30F01 /var>」付近にいる「キョクホウ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_05<tab>Despite a few paranormal hiccups in the form of Kinko's restless minions along the way, you and Kyokuho succeed in mending all four of the weakened barrier bonds.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_05<tab>キョクホウとともに、クガネの結界を張りなおした。クガネの「キョクホウ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_06<tab>The mending, unfortunately, appears to be temporary, and it is only a matter of time before the golden guardian of the forest is back for another attempt at vengeance. If a more permanent solution is to be found, Kyokuho will require your continued support. Visit him and his master back on Kogane Dori.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_06<tab>今のままでは、クガネに封じたヌシである金狐の荒魂は、いずれ再び姿を現しかねないという。根本解決の方法を探るのを手伝うため、小金通りの「キョクホウ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_07Before you can help Kyokuho lay the geomantic bonds anew, you will need to further strengthen your attunement to the heavens. In other words, train, train, and possibly train some more.

※The next astrologian quest will be available from Kyokuho upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_SEQ_07キョクホウと話した。解決に向けて協力できるよう、占星術の腕を磨いておこう。

※占星術師のレベルが68以上になると、クガネのキョクホウから次の占星術師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>While your visit fills my heart with joy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I cannot bring myself to smile knowing that the Lady Leveva is troubled so.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_000ごきげんよう、占星術の腕をさらに磨いているようですね。
一方、レヴェヴァ師といえば、ゴキゲン斜めです。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>Though she should be spending these final days before the symposium placing the final touches on her address to the Vault, she instead spends her time wandering about the Pillars in a daze, mumbling to herself about earth, wind, and water.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_001講話会の本番に向けて、準備が佳境ということもありますが、
キョクホウ君の不在も大きな要因となっているでしょう。
風水術の応用という研究が、停滞していますし……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>I fear that Kyokuho's departure has left a gap in Lady Leveva's heart that she knows not how to fill.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_002そんな状況で、師が難しい顔をして外出したきり、
一向に戻ってくる気配がありません……。
さすがに心配なので、探しに行こうとしているところでした。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>I have tried at length to set her mind at ease, but one need not be a reader of stars to guess how well that ended. Perhaps if you spoke with her, she would finally listen to reason.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_003お手数ですが、手分けして探してくれませんか？
上層のどこかにいると思うのですが……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Lady Leveva could be anywhere in the Pillars. Perhaps it would be best if we searched for her separately. I shall inform you via linkpearl if I happen across her first.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_009レヴェヴァ師を手分けして探しましょう。
上層のどこかにはいるはずですが……。
私も、すぐに探しに行くつもりです。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? To what do I owe the honor? No, let me guess─our good friend Jannequinard asked you to talk some sense into poor addle-pated Leveva.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_010どうした、)) (( )) 02 /var>！？
わしを探していたのか？
……いや、さてはジャンヌキナルの差し金だな？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_011<tab>And oh, goody. Today I have the privilege of being lectured by <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> of you.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_011やはりそうか……。
おっと、噂をすれば本人の登場だぞ？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_012<tab>Why Lady Leveva...and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Imagine finding you two out here this fair <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_012レヴェヴァ師に)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！！
こんなところにいらっしゃいましたか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_013<tab>Enough with the theatrics, Janne. I know your play here; and as I have told you time and again, I have not forgotten my duty to the Athenaeum or my obligations to the symposium. I simply need...time to think. <var 1A 02 /var>Alone<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_013まったく、心配性な奴め……。
大丈夫だ、講話会を投げ出したりはせぬ。
気がかりなことがあり集中できぬので、頭を冷やしていただけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_014<tab>To which I keep replying, why think alone when you have one of the greatest minds in the realm at your disposal? And <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_014解けぬ問いがあるのであれば、
智恵は多いに越したことはないでしょう？
悩みがあるなら、私たちにもお聞かせください。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_015<tab><sigh> The greatest minds, eh?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_015うむ……わしひとり考えていても仕方ないな。
そのせいで、講話会に支障が出るのは不本意だ。
ここは、ふたりの意見を聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_016<tab>Then riddle me this: why are the results of my reading from that day both <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Kyokuho arrived still weighing on my mind? Why does it feel as if I am missing...or rather misinterpreting some devilishly important detail?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_016アルカナ占いの結果を、ふと思い出してな。
占星術の未来について占った結果、運命を示す六枚目に、
正位置の「水瓶」が出て、新たな知の創出を暗示していた。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_017<tab>Peace comes, friends are made, dangerous paths are trodden, knowledge is gained. Did that not already occur? Kyokuho and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> both arrive as the Dragonsong War ends, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> saves Kyokuho from death at the Steel Vigil, and knowledge of geomancy is shared with the Athenaeum.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_017西の占星術と東の風水術、旅人である冒険者が、
破壊の災難と交わることで、新たな知が生まれる……
というのが、師の解釈でしたね？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_018<tab>Yes, but what if the coming destruction told by the inverted Spire was not the incident at the citadel, but something else? Something far more grave?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_018うむ……その一方で、これから起こりうる不運を示す四枚目には、
最悪の凶事を示す、逆位置の「塔」が出ていた……。
これは奇妙なことだとは思わぬか？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_019<tab>...Then that would mean the prophecy's “fruit of knowledge and hope” was not Kyokuho's stories of his art...but something different. Something we will only see by continuing on this perilous path?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_019占星術の未来に関して、知の創出は最大の「希望」。
これに最悪の「災い」という相反する要素が並び立つ……。
確かに奇妙ですが、解釈次第でいかようにでも読み取れるのでは？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_020<tab>But is it truly the path that is disastrous, or our decision to pursue it?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_020ふむ……では、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
汝なら、この占いの結果をどう解釈する？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_Q1_000_000<tab>What is your interpretation of the cards, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_Q1_000_000<tab>占い結果をどう解釈する？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A1_000_001<tab>At the end of the path of disaster is hope.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A1_000_001<tab>災いを避けると希望が現れる

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A1_000_002<tab>To seek hope would be disastrous.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A1_000_002<tab>災いを避ける希望がある

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A1_000_003<tab>A big promotion is just around the corner?
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_021<tab>Exactly what I was thinking. Only through the avoidance of some unforeseen peril will hope...and knowledge be acquired.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_021うむ、わしも同じ解釈だ……。
やはり思い切って相談してみてよかった。
おかげで、己の解釈に確信を持てた。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_022<tab>An interesting...if not fairly liberal interpretation of the cards...as well as the basic rules of grammar and syntax. No, the sixth card clearly states that hope is a resulting factor of the misfortune described in the fourth and fifth cards.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_022なるほど、そういう見方もあるな……。
「災い」を避けるために、知が活かせると……。
だが、新たな「希望」となる知が得られるとも解釈できぬか？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_023<tab>I know you are merely trying to ease my mind with humor, but this isn't the time for jests. If we are to understand where our fates lie, we must try and comprehend the signs we are given...and I believe those signs point to the pursuit of hope in the face of disaster.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_023さすがの汝も、解釈に迷うか……。
わしはな、「災いを避けると希望が現れる」と解釈したのだ。
新たな知を得るには、災いと対峙する必要があるとな。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_024<tab>And I believe the disaster in question has something to do with Kyokuho's return home, if not the return itself.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_024おそらく、逆位置の「塔」が暗示する「破壊の災難」こそ、
キョクホウの突然の帰郷の原因であろう……。
ならば「希望」となる新たな知は、この「災い」の先にある！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_025<tab>It could also mean that our friend is in danger.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_025ゆえに、故郷に戻ったキョクホウを訪ね、
ともに東方の「災い」を祓うべきであろう……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_026<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_026<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_026<tab>I see where you are going with this, and while I loved our red-robed ruckus-rouser as much as anyone (excepting Fleuraie perhaps), a journey at this time would mean the cancellation of our symposium, and with that, any chance of the Holy See ever taking us seriously.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_026しかし、シャーレアン式占星術を、
皇都イシュガルドに広めるという使命はどうするのですか？
講話会が中止され、師が不在となれば、夢は潰えるでしょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_027<tab>And now you can see why <var 1A 02 /var>I've been up here day and night biting my nails to the quick<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_027承知しておる。
ゆえに、悩んでいたのだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_028<tab><sigh> I apologize. A lack of sleep can work ill on one's humours. But...I think your intervention here today may have provided me a solution to our predicament.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_028だが、たった今、汝らが教えてくれた。
わしは、ひとりではないのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_029<tab>A solution that I am now kicking myself for not having come to earlier. A solution I myself proposed not days ago when deciding how I might attend Kyokuho's opening of the sixth heaven! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will travel to Hingashi!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_029)) (( )) 02 /var>、
わしに代わり、キョクホウとともに東方の災いを祓うのだ。
その先に占星術の未来があり、汝の成長もあると見た！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_030<tab>The reading did only mention “friends old” and “friends new.” I recall nothing in there about silver-haired astrologians from Sharlayan. But how do you propose <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> find our charge? The Far East is a big place. Perhaps we could write a letter?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_030確かに、アルカナ占いの結果とも合致しますね……。
でも、ひんがしの国の「クガネ」に帰郷したという手がかりだけで、
キョクホウ君を見つけることができるでしょうか？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_031<tab>Yes, and address it “To: Kyokuho. Hingashi.” No, you dullard. We have something far better! We have the stars, and our undying faith that they will guide us to that which we seek!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_031文を出そうにも、宛先もわからぬからな……。
だが、運命とは自分で切り開くもの。
「星の導き」を信じるのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_032<tab>Or, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> could start <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> search in Kugane, the port city from which Kyokuho claimed he came, focusing on locations which serve as exceptional venues for stargazing─a pastime our friend warmed to during his stay with us.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_032なるほど……占星術に対するあくなき向学心がある、
キョクホウ君なら、日々の星読みを欠かすことはないはず。
「星のよく見える場所」を探せば……！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_033<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Or<var 1A 01 /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> could─ No, wait. That is actually a decent proposal. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have your quest! May the stars guide you true! Oh, and I will expect reports. Many reports! Janne, let us return to the prepar─ <yawn> Alright, maybe after a few bells rest first...
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_033うむ、そういうことだ。
さあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
星の導きに従い、汝の、そして占星術の未来を切り開け！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_039<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for helping me convince Lady Leveva to return. However, if your journey does not bear fruit, I fear we may find ourselves back in the same boat as before. Not a real boat, mind you. A proverbial one. You, on the other hand, will be on a real boat...and then a proverbial one. Ahem.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_JANNEQUINARD_000_039<tab>星が、キョクホウ君へ導いてくれますように……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_039<tab>I am free once again to focus on the task at hand. Janne can be an annoying, pretentious, stubborn, pompous, muttonheaded lout...but I respect and cherish his desire to see my father's legacy preserved.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_LEVEVA_000_039<tab>占星術の未来のために、互いに最善を尽くそうではないか。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_040<tab>If it is the stars you seek, then you need only look up!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_040おや、星が見える場所をお探しですか……？
存じていますが、訪れることは勧めませんね。
我ら風水士の面汚し「バクチ風水士」がよくいるものですから。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_041<tab>Hahahaha! But if it is a <var 1A 02 /var>fool<var 1A 01 /var> you seek─one who calls himself a master of wind and water when in fact he is nothing more than a cheat, a liar, and a disgrace to our noble profession─then perhaps you might find the rat where all rats hide: near the piers.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_041滅亡論を流し、民の不安を煽って儲けようと企む悪党ゆえ、
貴方も騙されぬよう、ご注意ください。
困ったことがあったら、我ら風水士が相談にのりますよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_049<tab>You'd be wise to not allow that one your ear. He is liable to fill it with tales of woe and ruin in an attempt to cozen you out of your hard-earned coin─coin that would be better spent on the talents of a true geomancer.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_UDOKU_000_049「バクチ風水士」は、滅亡論を流して民の不安を掻き立て、
一山当てようと企む悪党ゆえ、騙されぬよう、ご注意を。
困ったことがあったら、我ら風水士が相談にのりますよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_FUUSUIO_000_049<tab>Any respectable merchant knows that without the sage counsel of a geomancer, their business is like to fail. But said counsel does not come cheap. If it is ours you seek, we can provide you with a reading in...three moons time. That is, unless you pay the expedition fee.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_FUUSUIO_000_049財を成したいならば、私ども風水士にご相談ください。
ただし相談が殺到しており、対応時期は確約できません。
お急ぎなら、謝礼を積んでいただかなければ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_FUUSUIJYO_000_049<tab>Most all those who work in shipping or in trade will keep a geomancer on retainer whom they call upon before making any significant business decision. They say that behind every wealthy man flows both wind and water.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_FUUSUIJYO_000_049商売人ならば、なじみの風水士を持つのが常識です。
風水士にも、腕の良し悪しがありますから。
貴方も怪しい風水士にひっかからぬよう、ご注意ください。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411A_000_040<tab>When I wish to walk under the stars, I go with my promised to the Tasogare Bridge spanning yon pier. The melting of crimson into indigo is a sight you will not soon forget.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411A_000_040星が見える場所ですって？
潮風亭の前にかかる黄昏橋からみる夜空は、実に美しいですよ。
朱色の橋と濃紺の夜空の対比が格別です。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411A_000_049<tab>When I wish to walk under the stars, I go with my promised to the Tasogare Bridge spanning yon pier. The melting of crimson into indigo is a sight you will not soon forget.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411A_000_049潮風亭の前にかかる黄昏橋からみる夜空は、実に美しいですよ。
朱色の橋と濃紺の夜空の対比が格別です。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_040<tab>Kugane is packed like a warehouse with multistoried hostels and teahouses, so the cobbles will ne'er afford a man a decent view of the skies. No, if you want to see the heavens in all their glory, you must needs make your way up. Take this bridge behind me. There, atop that mighty span, the stars await.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_040潮風亭の前にかかる黄昏橋ならば、星空がよく見えるでしょう。
この都市は、風水術が巧みに取り込まれているそうです。
橋の配置にも、特別な意味があるらしいですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_041<tab>She faces directly west of Kugane Castle, out towards the Ruby Tide and Othard beyond. It is said her location was determined by a great geomancer who told the first bugyo placing it there would ensure the city's prosperity for generations to come.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_041おかげで、今やクガネは大いに栄えています。
これも、風水士様のお力のおかげです。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_048<tab>Kugane is packed like a warehouse with multistoried hostels and teahouses, so the cobbles will ne'er afford a man a decent view of the skies. No, if you want to see the heavens in all their glory, you must needs make your way up. Take this bridge behind me. There, atop that mighty span, the stars await.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_048潮風亭の前にかかる黄昏橋ならば、星空がよく見えるでしょう。
この都市は、風水術が巧みに取り込まれているそうです。
橋の配置にも、特別な意味があるらしいですよ。

It is said her location was determined by a great geomancer who told the first bugyo placing it there would ensure the city's prosperity for generations to come.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_CHOUNIN02411B_000_049おかげで、今やクガネは大いに栄えています。
これも、風水士様のお力のおかげです。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_050<tab>(-???-)I see someone has taken my spot. I may just have to slit <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> throat and toss <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> body to the tide.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_050(-久しぶりに聞く声-)おや～珍しいこともあるもんだ。
俺の特等席に、今宵は先客がいるらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_051<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_051<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_051<tab>Hah hah hah! I'm pulling your arm, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...or was it ear? You Westerners have such odd sayings. What brings you so far from home?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_051！？
まさか、先客がとは！？
どうして、ここに！？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_052<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_052<tab>A path fraught with disaster? Misfortune? Impending <var 1A 02 /var>doom<var 1A 01 /var>? Hah hah hah!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_052師のアルカナ占いで、「破壊の災難」が示されていたって？
その災いを止めるために、が来てくれたのか？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_053<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_053<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_053<tab>Ahem. Yes, well, the situation may not be as encouraging as my jovial demeanor suggests.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_053さっすが、師匠はなんでもお見通しだな。
確かに、クガネは問題に直面してる……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_054<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_054<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_054<tab>It all began several decades ago when the bakufu decided they were opening the port to foreign trade vessels. To accommodate the influx of ships, a section of ancient coastline forest was cleared.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_054この港町は、数十年前、外国船を受け入れるために、
森を切り開いて作られた。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_055<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_055<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_055<tab>However doing so angered the entity who had guarded the wood for countless generations─a golden fox named Kinko.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_055だが、港の建築を妨害する存在がいた。
この地に千代の昔より棲み着き、守護してきたヌシの金狐だ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_056<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_056<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_056<tab>A great battle ensued, but claws and fangs were no match for cold steel. Kinko was slain and the new port completed.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_056人々は、街と港を開くためにヌシの金狐を討伐した。
そしてヌシ金狐の怨念を怖れると同時に、クガネの発展を願い、
うちの曾祖父さん、風水士「カザン」を招いた。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_057<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_057<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_057<tab>The fox's spirit, however, remained, spoiling our milk, withering our crops, causing storms that dashed ship after ship against our rocky cliffs. In desperation, the bakufu turned to the land's most powerful geomancer─my great-grandfather, Kazan.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_057カザンは、ヌシの魂を鎮めるため、
まだ更地だった街の四方に、風水術で結界を張ったんだ。
結果、クガネはひんがしの国随一の商港に発展を遂げた……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_058<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_058<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_058<tab>Kazan used the power of the sea, the skies, and the land to soothe the spirit long enough that he could erect an invisible barrier that not only protected the city, but ensured that it would prosper.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_058今や、風水士は財をもたらす存在として人々から崇められ、
権力者や商人の御用聞きになっている。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_059<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_059<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_059<tab>At once, the fortunes of Kugane's citizenry turned. My great-grandfather was hailed as a hero, and geomancy as the savior of our nation. Within a matter of moons, the streets were lined with the stalls and tents of would-be seers, the people practically throwing coin at them for their advice and blessings.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_059強欲な風水士たちは、儲からぬ術には目もくれなくなった。
本来なら、結界は定期的に張り直す必要があるのに、
長らく放置されたせいで、綻びが広がりつつある。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_060<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_060<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_060<tab>These pretenders, these <var 1A 02 /var>charlatans<var 1A 01 /var>, were not interested in the sacred rites passed down to my great-grandfather from his great-grandfather and his great-grandfather before him. They were not interested in maintaining the barrier that preserved Kugane's luster, and drove back the powers that would see it fall. No, they were more interested in lining their pockets. And now...
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_060さらに悪いことに、結界に関する知識の大部分は、
正しく継承されずに、失われちまってるときたもんだ……。
荒ぶるヌシの魂が、結界を破るのも時間の問題ってことさ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_061<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_061<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_061<tab>Now the bonds that hold the barrier in place are about to break, and there is none left with the knowledge to mend them! The knowledge that died with the passing of my grandfather...
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_061だから、俺は風水士仲間たちに、クガネに迫る危機を訴えて、
結界の修復への協力を求めてきた……。
だが、力添えどころか、詐欺師扱いされる始末さ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_062<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_062<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_062<tab>And so I set out to convince the geomancers of Kugane that only united would we discover the means to save our fair city. That only united would we stave off the darkness and bring lasting prosperity to one and all. That only united would my great-grandfather's legacy live on.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_062俺が目指す風水術は、私利私欲を満たすことじゃない。
曾祖父さんのような、人々を幸せにする術なんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_063<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_063<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_063<tab>Alas, I failed. Branded a deceiver by those very men and women who had grown fat on deceit. Unable to mend the bonds myself, nor rouse my peers to action, I stood on this very bridge and thought on an answer...and then I saw it in the setting sun. My answer lay in the West.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_063そのためにも、失われた結界術に替わる、
新たな知識を得る必要があった。
それで、占星術を学ぼうと思ったんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_064<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_064<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_064<tab>And so I packed my bags and headed to Eorzea, in search of something, <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var> that might help me save Kugane. I believed that something astrology, but before I could be certain, I was summoned home. This, you already know.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_064ところが、唯一信頼できる仲間から、
結界の綻びが拡大して、いよいよ危ないって報せがあってな。
これが、占星術を投げ出して帰郷した理由だ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_065<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_065<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_065<tab>Since then, I have been coming here every night, hoping the stars might provide me with another revelation. But they remain silent... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the heavens speak through you. Tell me, what do they say?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_065でも、こんな中途半端な俺には、為す術がなかった。
それで、ここで毎晩、星を見上げては知恵を絞ってるんだ。
なあ、なら、この綻びをどう繕う？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_Q2_000_000<tab>What do the heavens say?
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_Q2_000_000<tab>結界の綻びをどう繕う？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A2_000_001<tab>Use geomancy to mend the barrier.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A2_000_001<tab>風水術で結界を張り直す

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A2_000_002<tab>Use astrology to restore the barrier.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A2_000_002<tab>占星術で結界を修復する

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_A2_000_003<tab>Solve your own problems.
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_066<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_066<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_066<tab>I admit it was a long story, but did you not hear a single thing that I even said? If I could <var 1A 02 /var>mend<var 1A 01 /var> the barrier <var 1A 02 /var>myself<var 1A 01 /var>, I wouldn't have traveled halfway across the world in the first place!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_066それができれば、すぐにでもやるんだがな……。
風水術で結界を張る方法が、失われてしまったからこそ、
俺は、イシュガルドに占星術を学びに行ったんだぞ？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_067<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_067<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_067<tab>Wait... But I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> travel halfway across the world, and I <var 1A 02 /var>didn't<var 1A 01 /var> come home empty-handed. If I learned one thing while in Ishgard, it was that western astrology is in many ways a complement to geomancy. Used together, they might just work!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_067そうか、占星術は風水術に相似している。
いちから金狐の荒魂を封じる結界を張り直すことは無理でも、
占星術で結界の綻びを修復できるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_068<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_068<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_068<tab>That's... That's brilliant! I don't know why I didn't think of it. If there was one thing that I learned while in Ishgard, it was that western astrology is in many ways a complement to geomancy.  Used together, they might just work!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_068そうか、占星術は風水術に相似している。
いちから金狐の荒魂を封じる結界を張り直すことは無理でも、
占星術で結界の綻びを修復できるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_069<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_069<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_069<tab>Hah hah. Spare me your western─
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_069さすがのも、答えが出ないか……。
占星術師でも風水術の結界となると……いや、待てよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_070<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_070<tab>Your western...? Western? Western! Wait! If there was one thing that I learned while in Ishgard, it was that western astrology is in many ways a complement to eastern geomancy. Used together, they might just work!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_070何も、いちから結界を張り直すことはない……！
占星術で結界の綻びを修復できるかも……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_100_071<tab>After all, you need only use your Aspected Benefic and you can mend any injury, is that not so?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_100_071そうだ、あらゆるものを癒す「アスペクト・ベネフィク」なら、
きっと風水術の結界も修復できるはずだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_071<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_071<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_071<tab>...No, really─I'm genuinely asking. The lesson explaining the finer details of the stars' power and how to harness it was conveniently scheduled for the day <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> I returned home. But you... You know it all! Tell me you can help repair the barrier!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_071ああ……でも、俺は占星術の学びを途中で投げ出したから、
アスペクト・ベネフィクは扱えない。
、どうか力を貸してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_072<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_072<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_072<tab>Hah hah! I did it, Great-grandfather! I found a way to make things right!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_072恩に着るぜ！
都市の四方にある祠に対し、アスペクト・ベネフィクを放ってくれ！
もちろん、最後の仕上げは俺の風水術でなんとかする。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_073<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_073<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_073<tab>Well, then. We have no time to lose. My great-grandfather created his barrier by anchoring the energies of wind, water, and earth to four shrines located at the north, east, south, and west ends of the city. It is there the bonds must be repaired. We shall begin with the nearby westerly shrine on the Short Pier.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_073手始めは、小波止場の「西の祠」からだ……。
ひとまず現地に向かおう！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_080<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_080<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_080<tab>This is one of the shrines of which I spoke. It may not look like much, but if it were to be destroyed, the entire city would be overrun with large-testicled raccoon dogs and flying rainbow cats...or possibly just angry spirits.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_080見てくれ、あんな祠がクガネの四方にある。
結界の綻び具合を確認して、綻びがひどいようなら、
占星術で修復してくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_081<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_081<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_081<tab>My plan is simple─if I am correct, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aspected Benefic<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will intertwine with the barrier's geomantic energies, mending it as easily as it does flesh. We shall wait until nightfall to perform the rite, for the last thing we need is a drunken ronin breaking your concentration.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_081結界の綻びに「アスペクト・ベネフィク」を放てば、修復できる。
もしもに備えて、人気が少なくなる夜中を待って始めよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Test the barrier's strength at the westerly shrine.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>西の祠の結界の綻びを調べろ

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Test the barrier's strength at the southerly shrine.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>南の祠の結界の綻びを調べろ

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>Test the barrier's strength at the easterly shrine.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>東の祠の結界の綻びを調べろ

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_4<tab>Test the barrier's strength at the northerly shrine.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_4<tab>北の祠の結界の綻びを調べろ

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_DIRECTION<tab>Use <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aspected Benefic<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on the weakened bond.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_QIB_001_TODO_DIRECTION「結界の綻び」に
「アスペクト・ベネフィク」を使い結界を修復せよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_000<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_000<tab>Quickly! Check the shrine and tell me its condition!
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((姉者)) ((兄者)) /var>、まずは結界の綻び具合を調べてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_001<tab>It is worse than I thought. The speed with which the bonds deteriorate increases with each passing day. At this rate, they will not survive through the next new moon.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_001やっぱり修復が必要だ……
「結界の綻び」に「アスペクト・ベネフィク」を使ってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_002<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_002<tab>The magicks intertwine! Like two halves of a whole!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_002よし、見事に綻びが修復されたぞ！
最後に、俺の風水術で仕上げれば、できあがりだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_003<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_003<tab>To the next shrine! We will find it deep in Rakusui Gardens to the south of here.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_003やったぞ、大成功だ！
次は、「楽水園」にある「」に行くぞ、ついてきてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_01<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_01<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_01<tab>You know what to do. Attune with the shrine to determine the extent of the bond's damage.
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_01<tab>さあ、<var 08 E905 ((姉者)) ((兄者)) /var>、さっきと同じように頼むぜ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_004<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_004<tab>Servants of the fox? Our mending of the first westerly bond must have alerted her to our presence!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_004こ、こいつら、悪霊か！？
ヌシである金狐の荒魂が、俺らを邪魔しようと呼び寄せたか！？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_005<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_005<tab>Focus is required to complete the seal, and my heart will not rest easy until these restless spirits are sent back to the land.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_005結界の綻びを修復するには、精神の集中が必要だ。
ひとまず、周辺の悪霊どもを片付けちまおう……！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_02<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_02<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, before more are summoned!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_02さっすが、！！
また悪霊が現れる前に、綻びを修復しちまおうぜ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_005<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_005That wasn't so bad!
Now step aside. I shall complete the ritual.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_005、ご苦労さん！
後は、俺に任せてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_006<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_006<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_006<tab>That's half! At this rate, the barrier will be at full strength before sunrise! Onward, to Kugane Castle!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_006修復完了だ！
さあ、次は「クガネ城」の前にある「」に行こう！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_007<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_007<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_007<tab>It appears I spoke too soon... Kinko knows what we do, and is sending her minions out in force to stay our hands.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_007悪霊が、こんなに！？
金狐の野郎……いよいよ怒ってるらしいな、急ごう！！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_03<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_03<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Try and not stray too far from my side, if not for your safety...for mine!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_03、危ないから、あまり離れないでくれ！
俺が後ろを守るから、は祠を目指してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_04<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_04<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_04<tab>There's no end to them! I knew that Kugane had a bloody history, but to think this many of the dead still linger...
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_04くっ、また出やがったか……！
、片っ端から片付けちまおうぜ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_05<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_05<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Alright, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let us put this shrine behind us. I fear every moment we tarry, the stronger Kinko's gaze upon us grows.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_05流石は、だぜ！
さあ、祠の綻びを確認して、結界を修復してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_007<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_007<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_007<tab>Be my eyes, friend. I must now concentrate on the anchor.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_007、ご苦労さん！
後は、俺が引き受けた！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_008<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_008<tab>There is but one shrine remaining─the northerly. As you know...or do not, the north is where all ill fortune gathers. I expect the most resistance there. Prepare yourself.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_008残すは、「松葉門」前の「」だけだ！
そこが破られちまえば、今までの苦労が水の泡……急ごう！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_06<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_06<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_06Away! Away foul denizen of the dark...
It doesn't hurt to try, does it? L-Look out!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_06なっ、なんだ、こりゃ！？
悪霊が悪さする前に、さっさと片付けちまおう！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_07<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_07<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_07<tab>We cannot breathe easy until your magicks are cast and I have completed the rite. Hurry!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_07、これで最後だ！
結界の綻びを修復してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_008<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_100_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_008<tab>Deep breath, Kyokuho. You can do this...
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_100_008、ありがとよ！
よーし、最後の仕上げだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_009<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_000_009<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_009<tab>I, ah, <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> did it! We repaired my great-grandfather's barrier and thwarted the golden fox!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_000_009これで、すべての結界を修復できた！
俺たちだけで、クガネのヌシ、金狐の荒魂を封じてやったんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_QIB_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Aaargh! Was this failure...foretold in the stars...as well?
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_QIB_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>くっ……<var 08 E905 ((姉者)) ((兄者)) /var>、すまねえ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_090<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_090<tab>A fine display! Fine, indeed. Though, if it were I, I might have used Gravity instead of Malefic when the foul creature had─ Ah, right. I'll just be staying that tongue of mine again.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_090ふう……一時は、どうなることかと思ったが
これで、クガネの結界は安泰だな！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_091<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_091<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_091<tab>(-???-)Kyokuho! I was told there were spirits in the streets!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_091(-慌てた声-)キョクホウ！！
悪霊が現れたと聞いたぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_092<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_092<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_092<tab>And you arrive just as they are vanquished! How fortunate! Yes, Master Murakumo. The bonds are mended, made whole with western magicks...and a little shoulder grease, or was it knuckle grease? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_092ムラクモの爺さん、安心しな！
悪霊は片付けて、結界も、しっかり修復しておいたぜ！
に、手伝ってもらってな！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_093<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_093<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_093<tab>Western magicks? Then this ijin <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> is─
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_093おお……貴方が、)) (( )) 02 /var>様ですか？
お目にかかれるとは、光栄です！
貴方の偉大さは、キョクホウから常々聞いております。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_094<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_094<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_094<tab>None other! And wait until you see the reinforced bonds. The energies twist together with ours like sun and moon, like darkness and light. They are as one, Master!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_094ムラクモの爺さんは、俺の保護者みたいなもんだ。
曾祖父さん、カザンの弟子だったんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_095<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_095<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_095<tab>Then I was right to summon you home. Pardon my intrusion, traveler. I am Murakumo. Second pupil of the great Kazan, and instructor to young Kyokuho.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_095思いきって、キョクホウを呼び戻して正解だったな。
これで、「しばらくは」クガネも安泰だろう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_096<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_096<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_096<tab>But with Kugane safe...I can now return to Ishgard to complete my training as an astrologian. Huzzah!
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_096<tab>なら、占星術を学びに、イシュガルドに戻ってもいいな？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_097<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_097<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_097<tab>Absolutely not. While you have mended the weakened bonds for now, their ephemerality remains. Unless you expect your friend here to remain in Kugane for the remainder of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life, we will need to find a more permanent solution. In other words, the bonds must be laid anew.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_097いや、ならぬ。
結界を修復したところで、それは対症療法に過ぎん。
ときが経てば、ふたたび結界の綻びは広がるだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_098<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_098<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_098<tab>But you know as well as I, the secret to laying those bonds died with my grandfather!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_098じゃあ、どうしろっていうんだ？
結界を再構築する秘儀は、もう失われているんだぞ！？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_099<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_099<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_099<tab>Not a day goes by that I do not suffer the burden of my ineptitude. Had I shown promise in the art as your grandfather did, perhaps Kazan would have entrusted me with the knowledge as well.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_099さよう……。
私は大風水士カザンの弟子ながらも、才が至らず、
秘儀を授けてはもらえなんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_100<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_100<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_100<tab>But he did not, and now they are both gone. We can lament that which we cannot change, or we can put aside our past failures and seek the path which leads us forward.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_100そして、秘儀を継承したカザンの一番弟子、
キョクホウの祖父もまた、ヌシの呪いか、若くして急死……。
そのせいで、結界を構築する知識は失われてしまった……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_101<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_101<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_101<tab>My master is right. Perhaps there is something in my grandfather's tomes, or perhaps I may still find a way to win over the other geomancers to our cause. There is always hope, is there not?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_101今、残るのは、金運を開くとうたうエセ風水術ばかり……。
だから、占星術に活路を見出そうとしたんだが……
やはり秘儀について、調べ直すしかないのか。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_102<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_102<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_102<tab>If anything, you've given us time to search for an answer, and for that I am grateful. The city would be, as well, if they knew you had saved them from an army of angry wraiths looking to devour their souls and defecate their bones straight to the darkest of hells!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_102一度は諦めたことだが、心を入れ替えて取り組むしかないな。
ってなわけだから、俺はもう行くな。
……協力、ありがとよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_103<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_103<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_103<tab>In his haste to find a difficult answer, he looks past the simple one right before his eyes.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_103キョクホウの話を聞く限り、
風水術と占星術には、共通点があるそうですね？
となれば、貴方の知識は結界の再構築に役立ちましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_104<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_104<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_104<tab>It may take Kyokuho time to realize it, but <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are the hope which we seek. In time, you will come to see it, as well.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_104あの子は、普段は小金通りにいますので、
どうか、これからも力になってやってください。
ひとりの力には、限界がありますから……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_109<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_NAYAGA_000_109<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_109<tab>Though it was but a single generation past, the people of Kugane have already forgotten that the prosperity they experience is not the result of some serpent-tongued swindlers, but of the humble efforts of true geomancers like Kyokuho's great-grandfather.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_MURAKUMO_000_109キョクホウの曾祖父カザンは、風水術によって、
クガネに安全と発展をもたらしました。
しかし、その術は今や失われてしまったのです……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_110<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_110<tab>So, I guess this is farewell... Unless, that is, you're staying?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_110……！？
まさかこれからも、俺を手伝ってくれるのか？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_111<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_111<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_111<tab>You're staying!? <var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> staying! Master, <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> staying! What changed your mind?
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_111ありがとう、どうやらいい風が吹き始めたらしいぜ！！
ムラクモの爺さんはよき理解者だし、本物の風水術を知る、
数少ない存在だが、歳も歳だし無理もさせられない……。

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_112<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_112<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_112<tab>No, don't tell me. Knowing that you will be here with me and Master Murakumo is enough. I was beginning to worry what I would do the next time the city was invaded by Kinko's minions. The master can barely make his way out of the privy each morning, let alone battle blood-lusting specters.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_112俺ひとりで、どこまでやれるか不安だったんだ。
そういえば、レヴェヴァ師は西の占星術と東の風水術が、
融合することで、新たな知が得られると言ったんだよな？

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_113<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_113<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_113<tab>Now that you mention it, this all reminds me of that reading Lady Leveva conducted the morning I arrived at the Observatory. Something about friendly paths lined with dangerous fruit bushes winding their way to hope.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_113そして、「災いを避けることで希望が現れる」ってさ！
なら、なんとしても破壊の災難を回避しなきゃな。
よーし、何が何でも成し遂げてやろうぜ！

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_114<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHOU_000_114<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_114<tab>Could the stars truly have predicted all this? If so...I'm impressed! I will need to think more on the issue. Until then, might I suggest you continue the refinement of your art here in scenic Hingashi? You will find our beasts just as formidable as yours in the West, if not doubly so!
target:
TEXT_JOBAST650_02411_KYOKUHO_000_114手がかりが見つかったら、すぐに連絡する。
それまでは、占星術の腕をさらに磨いておいてくれ。
